# TSS Buffer {.unnumbered}

*Based on the [Bennett lab TSS protocol](https://wiki.rice.edu/confluence/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=27118902)*

### Pre-sterilized components
Makes **50mL** TSS Buffer

| Component | Stock Concentration | Sterilization method | Amount |
|-----------|---------------------|---------------------|--------|
| LB Media | 1x | Autoclaved | 42.5mL |
| PEG-3350 | 1g/mL | Filter-sterilized | 5mL |
| MgCl<sub>2</sub> | 1M | Autoclaved | 1mL |
| DMSO | 100% | -- | 2.5mL |

Store at 4&deg;C.

### Post-sterilized components

Makes **50mL** TSS Buffer

| Component | Stock Concentration | Amount |
|-----------|---------------------|--------|
| PEG-3350 | pure | 5g |
| MgCl<sub>2</sub> | 1M | 1mL |
| DMSO | 100% | 2.5mL |
| LB media | 1x | make up to 50mL (~46.5mL) |

Filter sterilize and store at 4&deg;C.
